cyscuvu_events.title: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Presentation
cyscuvu_events.description: We will have a Cortex Specialist from Palo Alto come present on using NG firewall along with IDS/IPS automation! It may be held virtually. More information on our Discord!

cyscuvu_events.title: Cloud Security / Pentesting
cyscuvu_events.description: Scott Piper, an expert in cloud security will be presenting on how he exploits cloud vulnerabilities! (Which is just someone else's computer).

cyscuvu_events.title: RMCCDC Qualifiers
cyscuvu_events.description: Our team will be competiting in National Collegiate Cyber Defense Competition Qualifiers. Send good vibes!

cyscuvu_events.title: Arctic Wolf Presentation
cyscuvu_events.description: Arctic Wolf will be coming to meet with us. More information to follow!

cyscuvu_events.title: Red Canary Cloud Architecture & Security
cyscuvu_events.description: We will have the priveladge of hearing from Dave Bogle, Principal Threat Researcher. Do you like cloud?

cyscuvu_events.title: CYSCUVU Service Project
cyscuvu_events.description: CYSCUVU has the oppurtunity to help out one of our local elementary schools unbox, cable manage & setup ~150 chromebooks.

cyscuvu_events.title: Meeting with Clyde Co.
cyscuvu_events.description: We will be meeting with Sherrie Cowley, Head of Cybersecurity at Clyde Co.! Bring all of your questions!

cyscuvu_events.title: Competition Debrief
cyscuvu_events.description: We'll be having a quick debrief from the competing members of Lockdown & CCDC. Bring questions!

cyscuvu_events.title: UB Lockdown Competition
cyscuvu_events.description: Our team will compete in this upcoming Lockdown Competition, hosted by University at Buffalo. GO WOLVERINES! Update: We got 4th place!

cyscuvu_events.title: WRCCDC Invitational
cyscuvu_events.description: Our team will be competing in the first WRCCDC Invitational of the competition year! Competition details below! Update: (Results still to be announced)

cyscuvu_events.title: Hivestorm Competition
cyscuvu_events.description: Our team sets out to compete for 1st place in this upcoming Hivestorm competition. Competition details below.

cyscuvu_events.title: Meeting with the NSA
cyscuvu_events.description: We'll hear from Cybersecurity/InfoSec industry experts from the NSA come talk to us about anything & how to work for the NSA. Possible Q&A at the end. Invite everyone you know!

cyscuvu_events.title: First Club Meeting of Fall 2024
cyscuvu_events.description: The first inaugural meeting for the Cybersecurity Club at UVU. We'll introduce the club, meet everyone, and vote for new leadership. Anyone is welcome to run for leadership!
